derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: via Latin from Greek homōnumon, neuter of homōnumos having the same name, from homos 'same' + onoma 'name'

means.word_mean: 1. two words are homonyms if they are pronounced or spelled the same way but have different meanings

stems_affixes.word_buile: homo同类的+centric中心的→adj.同中心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 单色的, 只有单色的
stems_affixes.word_buile: homo同类的+chrom颜色+atic表形容词→颜色一样的→单色的
homo同类的+gen产生+eous……的→产生相同的
homo同类的+sexual性别的→adj.同性恋的;n.同性恋
homeo=homo同类的+path病+y→顺着病相同的方面治疗

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同音异义字, 同名异物
stems_affixes.word_buile: homo同类的+onym名字→homonym名字相同,意义不同
homo同类的+sexual性别的→adj.同性恋的;n.同性恋
homo同类的+gen产生+ize表动词→产生一致→使一致

sentences.en: Two words are homonyms if they are pronounced or spelled the same way but have different meanings.
sentences.cn: 拼写发音相同但意思不同的两个单词是同形同音异义词。
